nodes.bodyText: So I guess issue was in case there were 2 subprocesses created in a succession, for example with multi-instance/loop subprocess, right? And at least 2 of them had the same timestamp... That's really quick!
Correct. Two parallel subprocesses from same parent created in the same millisecond... specially now having H2 pure in memory did the trick.
